title: RIP Driving Tests, Trolls vs Pogues  5.11.20
itunes:title: RIP Driving Tests, Trolls vs Pogues  5.11.20
description:
In episode 627, Jack, Miles, and Jamie are joined by comedian and Scam Goddess Laci Mosley to discuss the republicans coming for the Green New Deal, Georgia giving out driver licenses to teens without a road test, and then a pop culture round up about Outer Banks, Extraction, and Trolls World Tour, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. G.O.P. Coronavirus Message: Economic Crisis Is a Green New Deal Preview
  2. Nearly 20,000 teens in Georgia have received their driver's licenses without a road test
  3. Why Does ‘Trolls World Tour’ Relitigate Rock-Critic Debates?
  4. Justin Timberlake’s Return To R&B And Funk Is Depressingly Predictable
  5. Trolls World Tour Is A Poptimist Nightmare 
  6. AMC Theatres Refuses to Show Universal Movies After ‘Trolls World Tour’ VOD Release, Universal and Theater Owners Respond
  7. AMC Theatres Refuses to Play Universal Films in Wake of 'Trolls: World Tour'
  8. Regal Cinemas warns Universal over Trolls World Tour skipping theaters
  9. AMC’s Blacklist Of Universal Is A Risky Bluff Or A Major Mistake
  10. WATCH: Flying Lotus - Massive Attack (vibeangel mix1)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
